meanings.definition: A freestanding, open-sided structure typically found in gardens or parks.
meanings.sent1: The gazebo in the park provides shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: We had a picnic under the gazebo in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide-and-seek around the gazebo.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gazebo of memories, each corner holding a different moment.
meanings.sent5: The gazebo stood proudly in the garden, a peaceful retreat for all.

meanings.definition: To build or place a gazebo in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: They decided to gazebo a new structure near the pond.
meanings.sent2: We will gazebo the gazebo in the corner of the yard.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to gazebo a gazebo on the hill for a better view.
meanings.sent4: She gazeboed the gazebo with precision, ensuring it was level.
meanings.sent5: The team will gazebo the gazebo before the event next week.
